Reveal in System Explorer: 在系統檔案總管中顯示
Choose a branch to create a new worktree: 選擇用於建立 Worktree 的分支
A worktree with {1} {2} will be created: 將在 {0} 下建立 {1} 的 {2} Worktree
Open the new worktree in a new window?: 是否要在新視窗中開啟新建立的 Worktree？
Select the folder where you want to crea: 選擇要建立 Worktree 的資料夾
Select the new location to move the work: 請選擇要將 Worktree 的資料夾從 {0} 移動到的新位置
The worktree for the {0} folder will be: 將移除 {0} 資料夾的 Worktree
The following worktree folders will be p: 將清理以下 Worktree 資料夾
Add Git repository folder path: 新增 git 儲存庫路徑
Please select the Git repository folder: 請選擇 git 儲存庫資料夾
Enter the repository name for display: 輸入展示用的儲存庫名稱
Rename the Git repository alias: 重命名 git 儲存庫別名
Remove the Git repository reference from: 刪除 git 儲存庫引用
Are you sure you want to delete this rep: 確定刪除路徑為 {0}、別名為 {1} 的儲存庫引用？
Select the command you want to execute i: 選擇在終端機中需要執行的命令
Successfully removed the worktree for th: 成功移除 {0} 資料夾的 Worktree
The folder is not a valid Git repository: 該資料夾不是可用的 git 儲存庫
The Git repository folder already exists: git 儲存庫資料夾在設定中已存在
Please install the extension, click to s: 請安裝擴充功能，點擊搜尋 {0}
*Click to open this worktree in a new wi: *點擊以在新視窗開啟此 Worktree*
$(error) Detached from Git version\n\n: $(error) 已從 git 版本中分離
$(lock) The worktree is locked to preven: $(lock) 已鎖定該 Worktree，防止被意外清除
✨ Main worktree folder, cannot be cleare: ✨ Worktree 主資料夾，無法被清除和鎖定
Click to display worktree list in worksp: 點擊以顯示工作區內的 Worktree 清單
Click to display all worktree list: 點擊以顯示所有的 Worktree 清單
Click to display recently used folders: 點擊以顯示最近使用的資料夾
Select Git repository to create worktree: 請選擇用於建立 Worktree 的 Git 儲存庫
Please open at least one Git repository: 請在工作區中開啟至少一個 git 儲存庫
Please select the root directory contain: 請選擇包含多個 Git 儲存庫的根目錄
Fetch all remote commits on {0}: 在 {0} 擷取所有遠端提交
Fetch remote ( {0} ) on {1}: 在 {1} 擷取遠端 ({0}) 的提交
Open the repository in Source Control vi: 在原始碼控制檢視中開啟儲存庫
All folders have been added, no more fol: 已新增所有資料夾，沒有更多可新增的資料夾
Add to Git repository management: 新增至 Git 儲存庫管理
Open recently used folders: 開啟最近使用的資料夾
Choose a reference to create new branch: 選擇要用來建立新分支的參考
The branch {0} based on {1} will be dele: 將刪除基於 {1} 的分支 {0}
The selected items will be removed from: 選取的項目將會從列表中移除
Please select the items you want to remo: 請選擇您要移除的項目
Select Git repository to prune worktree: 請選擇需要清理 Worktree 的 Git 儲存庫
